column4: with which audio player I can auto-fetch lyrics as I play in a gnome environment???
Songbird
is on the repos???
no but it is super easy to install
where I can get songbird?
Google search Songbird
freeware
it is made by Mozilla
freeware isn't a license, I was wondering because there *might* be a reason to not being included in the repos
if I were going to judge because of the UI, you got 10 pts
give Songbird a try, you will love it I promise
what I meant by being in the repos, is that we normally *adapt* applications
i understand what you mean, it is fairly new and not in the repos yet, it would not surprise me to find it there soon though
although if they do their tests on a ubuntu system, they might taken care of that by themselves
let me know what you think
I though it was the license
it has the same license as all mozila software
so why's not in the repos???
I'd take care of it when time arises if no one has done that before
of course, I'll try it first
giht on
just found out it is not in the repos because it is a developers release
hehehe, also there's not because it forkes xulrunner heavily, and won't build with normal xulrunner, so in the meantime, I'll skip to the tarball
right on, have you installed yet?
